1.details: Create all necessary tables: doctors, patients, analyses, biomarkers, biomarker_results, reports, notifications. Include proper foreign keys, indexes, and constraints.

2.details: Set up security policies for each table to ensure doctors and patients can only access their relevant data. Enable RLS and create appropriate policies.

3.content: Create Storage Bucket for Medical PDFs
3.details: Set up Supabase storage bucket with appropriate security policies for storing medical reports while maintaining privacy.

4.details: Create two edge functions: 1) process-pdf (extract and analyze lab reports) 2) generate-report (finalize analysis with doctor approval). Include GROQ API integration for AI analysis.

5.content: Request and Configure GROQ API Key
5.details: Get GROQ API key from user for AI analysis functionality in edge functions. Add to Supabase secrets.

6.details: Create two test accounts: Doctor (jonathan@cabohealth.com, password: Doctor123!) and Patient (pamela.test@gmail.com, password: Patient123!) with proper profile data.

7.details: Deploy all components to the existing Supabase project (https://holtohiphaokzshtpyku.supabase.co) and verify all functionality works end-to-end.
